UPCOMING_ELECTIONS_CONTENT: To view upcoming elections, go to the '{{ELECTION_PROCEDURE}}' menu; to see in calendar format, visit the '{{ELECTION_CALENDAR}}' submenu, and for reports, go to the '{{POSSIBLE_SELECTION}}' option.
SPECIFIC_SELECTION_CONTENT: To quickly find a specific election, use the 'Election Type' and 'Candidate Type' filters and search.
CITY_CORPORATION_ELECTION_CONTENT: To view specific City Corporation elections, select 'Division Name,' 'RMO,' 'Election Type,' and optionally 'Candidate Type' to narrow your search. The default search range is the last 02 months; adjust the start and end dates as needed.
PLEASE_CONATCT: If you can't find answers, please contact
